introduction_english: Let's dive into the captivating world of "はつめい," a word that's often heard in conversations about creativity and new developments. You'll frequently encounter it when discussing inventions or breakthroughs in various fields.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "はつめい" means "invention." This term is often used when discussing the creation of new devices or processes that were not previously available. It can also refer to the act of creatively coming up with a novel idea or method. In a broader sense, "はつめい" encompasses anything that has been invented or introduced as a new concept or product.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 発見 : はっけん : discovery
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of the word "はつめい" is "はっけん." While "はつめい" refers to creating something new or an invention, "はっけん" means "discovery," which leans more towards finding something that already exists but was unknown.
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the word "はつめい" is "もほう." While "はつめい" is about creating or introducing something new, "もほう" means "imitation" or "copy," which involves replicating something that already exists without introducing originality.

collocations.kanji: 新しい技術をはつめいする
collocations.furigana: 新しい技術をはつめいする

collocations.kanji: はつめいの特許をとる
collocations.furigana: はつめいの特許をとる

collocations.kanji: はつめい家と呼ばれる
collocations.furigana: はつめい家と呼ばれる

collocations.kanji: はつめいと発見の違い
collocations.furigana: はつめいと発見の違い

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は新しい技術を発明する。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は新(あたら)しい技術(ぎじゅつ)を発明(はつめい)する。

translations.VI: Anh ấy phát minh công nghệ mới.
translations.MY: သူက နည်းပညာအသစ်တစ်ခုကို တီထွင်တယ်။
translations.HI: वह नई तकनीक का आविष्कार करता है।
translations.FA: او یک فناوری جدید اختراع می‌کند.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は発明の特許をとる。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は発明(はつめい)の特許(とっきょ)を取(と)る。

translations.VI: Anh ấy đăng ký bản quyền cho phát minh của mình.
translations.BN: সে তার আবিষ্কারের জন্য পেটেন্ট নেয়।
translations.ZH: 他给他的发明申请了专利。
translations.TL: Inilapat niya ang patent sa kanyang imbensyon.
translations.MY: သူသည် သူ၏ ရှာဖွေမှုကို မူပိုင်ခွင့် ပြုသည်။
translations.HI: वह अपने आविष्कार का पेटेंट लेता है।
translations.FA: او اختراع خود را ثبت اختراع می‌کند.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は発明家と呼ばれる。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は発明(はつめい)家(か)と呼(よ)ばれる。

translations.VI: Anh ấy được gọi là nhà phát minh.
translations.MY: သူကိုပညာရှင်လို့ခေါ်ကြတယ်။
translations.FA: او به نام مخترع شناخته می‌شود.

example_sentences.kanji: それは偉大な発明です。
example_sentences.furigana: それは偉大(いだい)な発明(はつめい)です。

translations.VI: Đó là một phát minh vĩ đại.
translations.MY: ဒါဟာ ကြီးကျယ်သော ဆန်းသစ်မှု ဖြစ်ပါတယ်။

example_sentences.kanji: 発明と発見の違いは何ですか？
example_sentences.furigana: 発明(はつめい)と発見(はっけん)の違(ちが)いは何(なん)ですか？

translations.EN: What is the difference between invention and discovery?
translations.ID: Apa perbedaan antara penemuan dan penemuan?
translations.ES: ¿Cuál es la diferencia entre invención y descubrimiento?
translations.VI: Sự khác biệt giữa phát minh và phát hiện là gì?
translations.FR: Quelle est la différence entre invention et découverte ?
translations.NE: आविष्कार र खोजबिचको भिन्नता के हो?
translations.BN: আবিষ্কার এবং যে প্রকৃতি তফাত কী?
translations.ZH: 发明和发现有什么不同？
translations.TL: Ano ang pagkakaiba ng imbento at pagtuklas?
translations.MY: 発明 と 発見 ၏ ကွာဟမှုက ဘာလဲ?
translations.HI: आविष्कार और खोज के बीच क्या अंतर है?
translations.FA: تفاوت بین اختراع و کشف چیست؟

meanings_translations.MY: တီထွင်မှု - ထက်မြက်သော
